attributes.action: Mel O'Connor: to make it law that the electorate know who they are voting for is above board
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that a law is passed that the electorate are made aware of every person putting up for election. whether they have been involved in the false expenses claims, if they have, beside each name on the election sheet it should say  how much was over-claimed  and if they have paid it back, or if they have not paid it back.  Also in the future that all mps wages are fixed by an independant body with no links to mps eg sitting mps or ex mps on the board.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
